name: CottageVille
description:
The main objective of the game is relaxation and productivity, through the customization of your personal space and atmosphere that suit your tone!

Key Features

  • Cottage Customization - change and toggle the appearance of furniture, items, etc.
  • Atmosphere - control the weather and time of the day to fit your mood!
  • Activity Status - share with others about what you are up to!
  • White Board - got something to remember? Make notes in your own personal cozy space!
  • Audio Player - load in and listen to your own music tracks using the built-in audio library menu!
  • Interactivity - some of your items may be interactable, granting you access to mini games!
  • Collective Coziness - invite your friends, send them friend requests, and see their cottages and activities!
